main event: A civilian observed a light moving north before it turned east, believing it to be a jet while watching from his patio.
interesting points: The observer used binoculars to observe the object,The light was similar in brightness to a satellite,The sighting occurred around 9 PM,The object was believed to be flying at an altitude of approximately 40,000 feet,The Dayton Police Force followed up on the observation in hopes of solving other cases.
sighted object: a jet-like object at high altitude
witness description: a civilian who was out on his patio
